plays.text: Goal scored by Steve Begin assisted by Jeff Shantz and Blake Sloan
Penalty to Jaroslav Spacek 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Jarome Iginla
Penalty to Deron Quint 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Craig Conroy assisted by Jeff Shantz and Igor Kravchuk
Penalty to Denis Gauthier 2 minutes for Interference Grant Marshall
Goal scored by Craig Conroy assisted by Blake Sloan and Mike Vernon
Penalty to Petr Buzek 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Kevin Dineen
Penalty to Craig Berube 2 minutes for Crosschecking Jaroslav Spacek
Penalty to Jamie Wright 2 minutes for Hooking Deron Quint
Goal scored by David Vyborny assisted by Ray Whitney and Radim Bicanek
Goal scored by Jarome Iginla unassisted
Goal scored by Toni Lydman assisted by Craig Conroy and Jarome Iginla
Penalty to Rob Niedermayer 2 minutes for Slashing Serge Aubin
Penalty to Robyn Regehr 2 minutes for High Sticking Kevin Dineen
Penalty to Jody Shelley 2 minutes for Roughing Ronald Petrovicky
Goal scored by Dean McAmmond assisted by Craig Conroy and Jarome Iginla
Penalty to Jaroslav Spacek 2 minutes for Charging Jarome Iginla
